snippet: Many parties were given at yesterday's benefit tea dance at Sherry's, of which Mrs. C. Stuart Macdonald was chairman. Proceeds of the event will augment the fund of the British-American Ambulance Corps for sending ambulances to Great Britain....

headline.main: TEA DANCE ASSISTS AMBULANCE CORPS; Many Entertain at Event in Aid of British-American Fund

lead_paragraph: Many parties were given at yesterday's benefit tea dance at Sherry's, of which Mrs. C. Stuart Macdonald was chairman. Proceeds of the event will augment the fund of the British-American Ambulance Corps for sending ambulances to Great Britain.
